definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
Moho (aka Mohorovičić discontinuity, the lower boundary of the earth's lithosphere)/abbr. to 莫霍面[Mo4 huo4 mian4]
pinyin: Mo4 huo4 luo4 wei2 qi2 bu4 lian2 xu4 mian4

definition: mechanics of a continuous medium/fluid mechanics
pinyin: lian2 xu4 jie4 zhi4 li4 xue2
lian2 xu4 yi4 ma3 jie1 duan4

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半连续补料能维持较长时间的较高日产气效率。

sentences.english: A new type of continuous contact model was developed for a spatial revolute joint.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型空间间隙转动副的连续接触模型。

sentences.english: The sand forms a continuous transgressive blanket .
sentences.chinese: 砂质物构成一个连续的海进盖层。

sentences.english: Vacuum continuous soakage on sweetmeat is grand reformation of sweetmeat processing.
sentences.chinese: 蜜饯的真空连续浸渍是蜜饯加工工艺的重大革新。

sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州连续两年贫困率攀升具有统计学意义。

sentences.english: For biological products, samples from several consecutively manufactured batches should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 对于生物制品，应当要提交连续几个生产批次的样品。

sentences.english: It can be compared with the periodic abstractor in the continuous dynamics.
sentences.chinese: 这对应于连续动力学系统中的周期吸引子。

sentences.english: I took three consecutive shots from beyond the three-point line and made all three-perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 我连续三次在三分线外远投，三个都进得很漂亮。

sentences.english: Connection among quasi-H closedness, weakly continuous mapping and compactness is also shown.
sentences.chinese: 并指出了拟H闭性与弱连续映射和紧性的联系。

sentences.english: Nearly 3 weeks of continuous heavy rains and floods in eastern Australia, calamity-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 连续近3周的暴雨和洪水使澳大利亚东部灾难深重。

sentences.english: One day at the end of yr2003, I have even interpreted for 10 hours successfully.
sentences.chinese: 我，作为翻译也连续作战了10个小时。

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 应用不连续缓冲系统薄膜电泳法行酶谱分析。

sentences.english: They had been working the stream for 10 days, but it hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他们连续10天在这条小溪里淘金，但还没淘出金子。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of continuous suture in aortic valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉瓣置换中连续缝合方法的应用。

sentences.english: The ice storage tank provided by the invention is mainly applied to the evaporative supercooled water continuous ice-making system.
sentences.chinese: 本发明主要应用于蒸发式过冷水连续制冰系统。

sentences.english: In the control group, only continuous wave was used.
sentences.chinese: 对照组不分组，采用连续波治疗。

definition: to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
